meta.title: Окружность
meta.description: Свойства окружности, касательные, вписанные и описанные окружности

geometry.description: Square ABCD, O is midpoint of CD, circle with center O passes through A

tasks.text: Точка O является серединой стороны CD квадрата ABCD. Радиус окружности с центром в точке O, проходящей через вершину A, равен 2√5. Найдите площадь квадрата ABCD.
tasks.svg:
<svg viewBox="0 0 220 200" class="w-full max-w-[250px] h-auto mx-auto">
  <rect width="100%" height="100%" fill="#0a1628"/>
  <circle cx="110" cy="110" r="85" fill="none" stroke="#5a9fcf" stroke-width="1.5"/>
  <polygon points="72,34 148,34 148,110 72,110" fill="none" stroke="#c8dce8" stroke-width="2"/>
  <line x1="110" y1="110" x2="72" y2="34" stroke="#5a9fcf" stroke-width="1.5" stroke-dasharray="6,4"/>
  <g transform="translate(110, 110)">
    <line x1="-5" y1="0" x2="5" y2="0" stroke="#7eb8da" stroke-width="1"/>
    <line x1="0" y1="-5" x2="0" y2="5" stroke="#7eb8da" stroke-width="1"/>
    <circle cx="0" cy="0" r="2" fill="none" stroke="#7eb8da" stroke-width="0.8"/>
  </g>
  <g transform="translate(72, 34)">
    <line x1="-5" y1="0" x2="5" y2="0" stroke="#7eb8da" stroke-width="1"/>
    <line x1="0" y1="-5" x2="0" y2="5" stroke="#7eb8da" stroke-width="1"/>
    <circle cx="0" cy="0" r="2" fill="none" stroke="#7eb8da" stroke-width="0.8"/>
  </g>
  <g transform="translate(148, 34)">
    <line x1="-5" y1="0" x2="5" y2="0" stroke="#7eb8da" stroke-width="1"/>
    <line x1="0" y1="-5" x2="0" y2="5" stroke="#7eb8da" stroke-width="1"/>
    <circle cx="0" cy="0" r="2" fill="none" stroke="#7eb8da" stroke-width="0.8"/>
  </g>
  <g transform="translate(148, 110)">
    <line x1="-5" y1="0" x2="5" y2="0" stroke="#7eb8da" stroke-width="1"/>
    <line x1="0" y1="-5" x2="0" y2="5" stroke="#7eb8da" stroke-width="1"/>
    <circle cx="0" cy="0" r="2" fill="none" stroke="#7eb8da" stroke-width="0.8"/>
  </g>
  <g transform="translate(72, 110)">
    <line x1="-5" y1="0" x2="5" y2="0" stroke="#7eb8da" stroke-width="1"/>
    <line x1="0" y1="-5" x2="0" y2="5" stroke="#7eb8da" stroke-width="1"/>
    <circle cx="0" cy="0" r="2" fill="none" stroke="#7eb8da" stroke-width="0.8"/>
  </g>
  <text x="60" y="26" fill="#c8dce8" font-size="14" font-family="'Times New Roman', serif" font-style="italic" font-weight="500" text-anchor="middle" dominant-baseline="middle" class="geo-label">A</text>
  <text x="154" y="26" fill="#c8dce8" font-size="14" font-family="'Times New Roman', serif" font-style="italic" font-weight="500" text-anchor="middle" dominant-baseline="middle" class="geo-label">B</text>
  <text x="154" y="124" fill="#c8dce8" font-size="14" font-family="'Times New Roman', serif" font-style="italic" font-weight="500" text-anchor="middle" dominant-baseline="middle" class="geo-label">C</text>

</svg>

geometry.description: Points M and N on different sides of diameter AB

tasks.text: На окружности по разные стороны от диаметра AB взяты точки M и N. Известно, что ∠NBA = 32°. Найдите угол NMB.
tasks.svg:

  <rect width="100%" height="100%" fill="#0a1628"/>
  <circle cx="110" cy="105" r="85" fill="none" stroke="#5a9fcf" stroke-width="1.5"/>
